title: Logging in to BTS
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak" 
AND the user has an MLB .com account
AND the user has never logged into "Beat the Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has just created an account
AND logs in 
AND opens the My Picks page 
AND scrolls up
custom_expected: THEN they will not be able to see past picks as they have not made any

title: User navigates to "My Picks" Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on My Picks
custom_expected:
THEN the following sections will display on the My Picks tab:
- The navigation dropdown will be in the upper left corner
- The logged in user's streak will appear in the top right corner
AND dates will be listed on the left
AND where there is a single pick listed
- The option to double down is listed under the single pick
OR where there is no pick
- The option to 'Select a Player'

title: User selects a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the Select a Player option for an available date
custom_expected:
THEN the "MAKE A PICK" page opens
AND the user will see 3 sections accessible:
Top Picks| My Recent | All Players
AND the Top Picks and My Recent will display a Player row
AND the All Players will display a team row

title: When a new user navigates to "My Picks"
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN a new user logs into the app on a newly created account
AND is on the My Picks page
custom_expected:
THEN when they attempt to scroll up they will not be able to see past picks because they have not made any
AND all previous days will appear in gray text

title: User confirms player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks on the 'Make a Pick' cell for today
And the user selects a player from the Top Picks tab on the the Make a Pick page
And taps on the 'Yes' button on the confirmation pop up
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought back to the My Picks page
AND see their pick updated on that day

title: User selects "Double Down" feature for the first time
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has submitted 1 pick for the day 
AND never used double down feature 
AND taps on the 'Double Down' cell for that day
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Double Down confirmation that says:

"Want to Double Down?
Pick two players on any day to try to grow your streak by two.
But it's risky - if either player fails to get a hit, your streak will go back to ZERO."

title: Returning user selects "Double Down" feature
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has submitted 1 pick for the day 
AND has used the double down feature 
AND the user taps on the 'Double Down' cell for that day
AND the user selects a player, then taps 'Yes' on the confirmation
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought back to the My Picks page
AND see their pick updated on that day

title: User's pick still displays after refreshing the page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has already made his/her pick for the day
AND the pick is stored in the database
custom_steps: THEN the user refreshes the page
custom_expected: The pick will always display after the page is refreshed

title: User doubles down with a player scheduled for a doubleheader
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps double down 
AND selects a player as their first pick with a double header scheduled for that day
custom_expected:
THEN the pick should be submitted as expected
AND on the my picks page will show the same player for both double down picks
AND the lock time will be the same for both picks
AND the lock time will be the lock time of the earlier game

title: User is on my picks page before the player's time lock
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the my picks page before their picked player's team lock time
custom_expected: THEN the user will see their pick with an unlocked icon

title: User is on my picks page after the player's time lock
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the my picks page after their picked player's team lock time
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see their pick with a locked icon
AND it will state 'Pick Locked At XX:XX PM ET'
AND if the user had not selected a Double Down option, that section will be removed

title: User has not made picks but all games are locked
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the My Picks page 
AND has not selected a player and all the games for that particular date are locked
custom_expected: THEN the user will NOT see 'Select a player' text in the date cell

title: The user has made picks the past 2 days and is on the My Picks page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user has made picks the past 2 days and is on the My Picks page
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the past 2 days of picks at the top

title: The user has made no picks the past 10 days and is on the My Picks page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user has made no picks the past 10 days and is on the My Picks page
custom_expected: THEN the first date they will see at the top will be today's

title: The user changes timezone to one other than ET and view the My Picks page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user changes timezone to one other than ET and view the My Picks page
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the correct dates show properly with all game times set to ET

title: The users selected player records a hit
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a pick, before the game has been scored 
AND the player recorded a hit during the game and after the game has been scored
custom_expected: THEN the user's streak should advance by one

title: The users selected player does not record a hit
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a pick, before the game has been scored 
AND the player did not record a hit during the game and after the game has been scored
custom_expected: THEN the user's streak is over and should revert back to zero

title: The user elects to use their mulligan after their selected player does not record a hit
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a pick, before the game has been scored 
AND the player did not record a hit during the game and after the game has been scored 
AND the user has used the mulligan
custom_expected: THEN the user keeps their streak but it does not advance by any amount, the pick will indicate that the mulligan has been used AND the user's profile will now show mulligan as used

title: The users selected player does not record an at bat
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a pick, before the game has been scored 
AND the player did not bat during the game and after the game has been scored.
custom_expected: THEN the user keeps their streak but it does not advance by one, the pick cell will indicate that the player did not have any at bats

title: The user doubles down and both players record a hit(s)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN a user makes a double down pick, after the game has been scored and both picks got a hit
custom_expected: THEN the user's streak should advance by two

title: The user doubles down but only one player records a hit
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN a user makes a double down pick, 
AND only one of the players recorded a hit during the games and after the games has been scored 
AND the user does not have a Mulligan available for the streak
custom_expected:
THEN the user's streak is over 
AND the user's streak should revert back to zero

title: The user doubles down but neither player records a hit
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a double down pick
AND neither players recorded a hit during the games and after the games has been scored
custom_expected:
THEN the user's streak is over 
AND the user's streak should revert back to zero

title: The user doubles down with one hitter recording a hit but the other does not receive an official AB
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a double down pick
AND one player recorded a hit during the game and after the game has been scored 
AND one player did not have a at bat during the game and after the game has been scored
custom_expected:
THEN the user's streak should advance by one, the user should be able to see the batter results for the one who recorded a hit 
AND text indicating that the other pick did not have an at bat

title: The user doubles down and only one player records a hit but the user mulligans for the other player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN a user makes a double down pick
AND only one of the players recorded a hit during the games and after the games has been scored 
AND the user used the mulligan
custom_expected: THEN the user's streak will not increment and the user will see "mulligan save" for both picks

title: The user has a current streak but misses the next day of picks
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has a streak in progress 
AND the user does not make a pick for the day of games and all of the day's games have been processed and the next day is available for selection
custom_expected:
THEN the user's streak will be maintained 
AND they will be able to resume it when they make a their next pick

title: The user taps on a pick that has been scored
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a pick that has been scored
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to a scoring breakdown of the player
AND each of the Innings where the player was at bat will display
AND the Pitcher at the time will be listed
AND the At Bat result will be listed
AND the Follow in At Bat will be listed

title: The user is on the Leaderboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Leaderboard
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see sections in the segmented controller at the top:
Current Streak (*this season year*) | Season Streak (*this season year*) | MLB All-Time | BTS All-Time | Friends | Groups

title: User selects Groups Leaderboard but has has no MLB Groups created
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Groups Leaderboard 
AND the user has no MLB Groups created
custom_expected:
THEN no leaderboard will display
AND the following message will display: "This leaderboard is unavailable. Create groups on MLB.com to access this feature"

title: The user is on the overall tab and there are more than 25 results
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the overall tab at the top, scrolls down 
AND there are more than 25 results on that particular leaderboard page
custom_expected:
THEN the first 25 results will load
AND when you get to the bottom of the list the next 25 results will load
AND will continue until there are no more results

title: The user taps on the arrow to the right of the Current Season header
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Leaderboard Overall Tab 
AND taps on the arrow to the right of the Current Season header
custom_expected:
THEN the Overall Leaderboard will change from 'Current Season' standings to the 'BTS All Time' standings
AND pressing the arrow again will change the Overall Leaderboard from 'BTS All Time' to 'MLB Hit Streaks'

title: The user taps on the leaderboard header name
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Leaderboard Overall Tab 
AND the user taps on the leaderboard header name
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Overall Leaderboards options menu
AND the user will see three options to choose from:

Current Season
BTS All Time
MLB Hit Streaks

AND there will be a Done option in the top left to return to the Overall Leaderboard
AND a check will appear next to the Overall Leaderboard they were on at the time the menu was opened

title: The user taps on Current Season Overall Leaderboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Leaderboard Overall Tab 
AND the user taps on Current Season Overall Leaderboard
custom_expected:
THEN the list of user standings will appear for the Current Season
AND the list of users will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above the standings

title: The user selects the 'BTS All Time' Overall Leaderboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'BTS All Time' Overall Leaderboard
custom_expected:
THEN the list of user standings will appear for all BTS seasons
AND the list of users will appear in Season Streak Descending order
AND the year of the streak will be displayed
AND the current logged in user's best streak stats will appear above the standings

title: The user selects the 'MLB Hit Streak' Overall Leaderboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'MLB Hit Streak' Overall Leaderboard
custom_expected:
THEN a list of MLB players will appear
AND the list will show the each player's longest hit streaks
AND the list will be sorted by Hit Streak Descending order
AND the year the streak occurred will be displayed
AND the current logged in user's best streak stats will appear above the standing

title: The user selects the Friends leaderboard but is not logged into facebook
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Friends leaderboard but is not logged into facebook
custom_expected:
THEN the leaderboard list will not populate
AND the following message will display: "This leaderboard is unavailable. Log into Facebook to access this feature"
AND a Facebook connect button will display below the message

title: The user selects the Friends leaderboard but is logged into facebook
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Friends leaderboard but is logged into facebook
custom_expected:
THEN the list of the user's Facebook friends' standings will appear for the Current Season
AND the list of players will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above Friends' standings

title: The user taps on the 'Invite Friends' tab underneath the segmented controller
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the 'Invite Friends' tab underneath the segmented controller
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see 4 options:

Facebook
Twitter
Email
Text Message

title: The user taps the 'Invite Friends' tab without having a carrier connection
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the 'Invite Friends' tab without having a carrier connection
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see 4 options:

Facebook
Twitter
Email
Text Message

title: The user is not in any groups but navigates to the Groups view
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is not in any groups
AND navigates to the groups view
custom_expected: THEN the groups home default screen appears with a "Join or Create Group" button

title: The user taps on the Join or Create Group button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Join or Create Group button
custom_expected: THEN the group option action sheet appears with "Create a New Group" and "Join an Existing Group"

title: The user taps on the "+"(plus symbol) in the top right corner or "Create a New Group" from the flyout menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the "+"(plus symbol) in the top right corner or "Create a New Group" from the flyout menu
custom_expected: THEN the Create New Group form appears

title: The user leaves all the fields blank and taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user leaves all the fields blank and taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_expected: THEN a message appears that the group requires a name

title: The user fills in only the Group Name and leaves Description empty
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills in only the Group Name
AND leaves Description empty 
AND sets Private Off. 
AND taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_expected:
THEN the group is created 
AND the user receives a confirmation email (email will not be ready for 5.0)

title: The user fills in the Group Name  AND the Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills in the Group Name 
AND the Description
AND sets Private Off
AND taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_expected:
THEN the group is created 
AND user receives a confirmation email 
(This is to check that adding Description does not cause any issues)

title: The user enters a group but the passwords do not match
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills in only the Group Name
AND the description 
AND sets Private On. 
AND enters a password but leave the confirm password field blank
AND taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_expected: THEN a message appears that the passwords do not match

title: The user enters a group with all the correct criteria met
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills in only the Group Name
AND the description 
AND sets Private On. 
AND enters a password with a matching confirmation password
AND taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_expected:
THEN the group is created 
AND user receives a confirmation email (email will not be ready for 5.0)

title: The user edits a self created group
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on a group created by the current user
AND taps "Edit" from the Your Groups list
custom_expected: THEN the Group Edit form appears

title: The user changes the group name
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form
AND changes the group name. 
AND taps "Save Changes"
custom_expected:
THEN the group is saved 
AND the new group name appears in user's Your Groups list

title: The user changes the group description
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form
AND changes the group description. 
AND taps "Save Changes"
custom_expected:
THEN the group is saved 
AND new group description appears in user's Your Groups list

title: Password is required for user to switch group from Public to Private
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a public group
AND changes the Private setting to On
AND taps "Save Changes"
custom_expected: THEN a message appears that a password is required

title: User checks their streak counters
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the profile page
AND the user has previously made picks 
AND the user checks their streak counters
custom_expected: THEN at the top the "Current Streak' and 'Season Long' streaks will be accurate

title: User checks their previous pick stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the profile page
AND the user has previously made picks 
AND the user checks their pick stats
custom_expected: THEN the Pick, Pick Avg, Hits-ABs, Batting Avg should all be accurate

title: The user has made at least 3 scored or locked picks and is on the profile page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user has made at least 3 scored or locked picks and is on the profile page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the last 3 picks they made
AND the dates they pick those players
AND the opponents they played

title: User taps on the recent picks section
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the profile page
AND the user has made a pick in the past 
AND the user taps on the recent picks section
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Recent Picks page
AND they will see there recent picks from most recent to first pick
AND the user will see the date they picked the player
AND how the player was scored on that date
AND they will also see the current streak after that day

title: The user taps on the the Top Picks section
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes to profile 
AND the user taps on the the Top Picks section
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Top Picks page
AND see the players they picked
AND these players will be ordered from most times picked to least time picked
AND their will be the number of times they picked that player
AND they will also show the results of their picks

title: The user makes a pick that has locked AND the user goes into the profile page to view recent picks
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a pick that has locked 
AND the user goes into the profile page to view recent picks
custom_expected: THEN in the recent picks should see the recently made pick (the last 4 locked picks will be shown in recent picks)

title: The user taps on Achievements section
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Achievements section
custom_expected:
THEN the Prizes tab will be open
AND if there are no prizes: No prizes available
AND if there are prizes: Claim and Unclaimed prizes

title: The user taps on an unclaimed prize
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on an unclaimed prize
custom_expected: THEN the prize will open

title: The user claims a prize
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user has claimed a prize
custom_expected:
THEN the BTS logo will become grey scale (orange background) with Claimed in red text over it
AND it has Earned Date and Claimed Date on separate lines with dates

title: The user is on the profile page and has earned badges
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the profile page and has earned badges
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the earned badge icons under the "Achievements" section 
AND locked icons for the ones still unearned

title: The user taps on Achievements "See All" button or the array of badge icons then taps "Badges" in the selector
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Achievements "See All" button or the array of badge icons then taps "Badges" in the selector
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the badge page which will display all the badges earned by the user

title: The user is on their Achievements page, Badges section and taps a badge cell
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on their Achievements page, Badges section and taps a badge cell
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be shown the badge detail page explaining how the badge is earned
AND it will also show the amount of times that the user has earned each badge as long as they earned more than 1

title: The user is on the Badges selection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Badges selection
custom_expected:
THEN all unearned badges will be distinguishable from the earned badges by locked diamond icons
AND verify that all badges (earned color images and locked images) appear correctly in retina and non-retina devices

title: The user taps on the Double Double Down badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Double Double Down badge
custom_expected:
THEN the Double Double Down badge opens
AND the Double Double Down label is legible
AND it reads the definition: Successful Double Down two days in a row
AND it has a lock icon if not earned
AND it has a badge icon if earned

title: User taps on the Triple Double badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on the Triple Double badge
custom_expected:
THEN the Triple Double badge opens
AND the Triple Double label is legible
AND it reads the definition: Pick a player that gets 2+ hits, three days in a row
AND it has a lock icon if not earned
AND it has a badge icon if earned

title: The user taps on the Garden Variety badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Garden Variety badge
custom_expected:
THEN the Garden Variety badge opens
AND the Garden Variety label is legible
AND it reads the definition: Get a streak of eight while not repeating players
AND it has a lock icon if not earned
AND it has a badge icon if earned

title: The user taps on the Road Warrior badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Road Warrior badge
custom_expected:
THEN the Road Warrior badge opens
AND the Road Warrior label is legible
AND it reads the definition: Successfully pick five players who are playing on the road
AND it has a lock icon if not earned
AND it has a badge icon if earned

title: The user taps on the Mr Perfect badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Mr Perfect badge
custom_expected:
THEN the Mr Perfect badge opens
AND the Mr Perfect label is legible
AND it reads the definition: Go one week without your streak breaking (min. 7 hits)
AND it has a lock icon if not earned
AND it has a badge icon if earned

title: The user taps on the Make the Leaderboard badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Make the Leaderboard badge
custom_expected:
THEN the Make the Leaderboard badge opens
AND the Make the Leaderboard label is legible
AND it reads the definition: Achieve Leaderboard status for one day
AND it has a lock icon if not earned
AND it has a badge icon if earned

title: The user taps on the Leader of the Pack badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Leader of the Pack badge
custom_expected:
THEN the Leader of the Pack badge opens
AND the Leader of the Pack label is legible
AND it reads the definition: Be on top of the Leaderboard for one day (min 10 game streak)
AND it has a lock icon if not earned
AND it has a badge icon if earned

title: The user taps on the Beat the Steak badge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has earned the respective badges
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Beat the Steak badge
custom_expected:
THEN the Beat the Steak badge opens
AND the Beat the Steak label is legible
AND it reads the definition: Join Beat the Streak by making your first pick
AND it has a lock icon if not earned
AND it has a badge icon if earned

title: Each item on the page has a headline/blurb
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user has navigated to the More Information page
custom_expected: THEN Each item on the page should have the correct headline and blurb that goes with that item.

title: Each item should have an image that is 160x90
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user has navigated to the More Information page
custom_expected: THEN Each item on the page should have a display image corresponding to the particular item. This image should be 160x90

title: The button at the bottom of each item should redirect to the correct URL
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps: WHEN the user has navigated to the More Information page
custom_expected: THEN the button at the bottom of each item should redirect to the correct URL corresponding to that item.

title: When the URL text field is empty, no button should be displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has navigated to the More Information page
AND the URL text field is empty
custom_expected: THEN no button at the bottom of the item should be displayed.
